info.name: Purple Haze for Mastodon [190214 UPDATE]
info.description: Happy Valentine's Day! Here's the V2.0 of Purple haze. A plain purple theme I made for cmx.im. //Inspired by Sogo Osaka from Idolish7 // Works with most of the Mastodon instances. Feel free to use it in your own instance. (Don't forget to add the domain at the list) Grey background version (I'll update it later): Purple Haze (Grey background) for Mastodon Suggestions for improvement are always appreciated. <3 ———————————— 紫霧主題 - cmx.im 適配大部分實例（2.7.1可用） 背景為深紫色，灰色版本請至 Purple Haze (Grey background) for Mastodon 歡迎使用和提出意見。 感謝逢坂壮五和cmx所有提出意見幫助完成的縣民。
info.additionalInfo:
19.02.14  -V2.0:
Now adapted for Mastodon 2.7.1.

18.10.28  -V1.0.8:
Fix button colors.

18.10.23  -V1.0.7:
Bug fixes. (For mobile device)

18.10.12  -V1.0.6
Bug fixes.

18.09.22  -V1.0.5:
Bug fixes. (retoots column)

18.09.19  -V1.0.5:
The mastodon has updated to V2.5.0 so I also made some changes to the theme.
You can now check the full background image of your info page! ( TELL ME IF YOU LIKE IT)
●Bug fixes and improvements of preferences page and personal info page.

18.06.25  -V1.0.4: 
●Changes of text color on about page
●The background color of status will now change when you click on it

18.06.20  -V1.0.3: 
●Fixed link color in personal info
●Fixed background color of retooooooot dialog box 

18.06.14  -V1.0.2: 
●Fixed background color of follow requests page
●Fixed background color of toot detail page

18.06.13  -V1.0.1: 
●Fixed background color of moved note
●Improved search bar
●Fixed user page
●Mobile device browsing support

18.06.12 -V1.0:
Release
